trans-unit.source: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 标识是否可设置或为匿名用户访问的配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: The SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute 类用于确定是否可以访问的自定义配置文件实现的属性，如果用户是匿名用户。

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息，请参阅配置元素提供的文档。

trans-unit.source: If no SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute 为配置文件属性指定，则不允许匿名访问的配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 实现的自定义配置文件是继承自的类<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中指定自定义用户配置文件类型`inherits`配置元素，如下面的示例中所示的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute"></xref> class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute"></xref>类并指定是否允许匿名访问的关联的配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>类用于确定是否可以访问的自定义配置文件实现的属性，如果用户是匿名用户。</xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息，请参阅配置元素。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>为配置文件属性，对配置文件属性的匿名访问不允许指定。</xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 实现的自定义配置文件是继承自的类<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if anonymous users can access the associated profile property; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果匿名用户可以访问您的关联的配置文件属性。，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否用户是匿名用户是否可以访问的自定义配置文件实现关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if anonymous users can access the associated profile property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果匿名用户可以访问您的关联的配置文件属性。，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow*> property is set to the default value.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow*>属性设置为默认值。</xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow*> property is set to the default value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow*>属性设置为默认值; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow*>
